question:
Mrs. Sony    : Can you do the washing-up, please?
Mariam : I'm sorry, I can't. I have to do my homework.
Mrs. Sony
: Oh. Well, go and start your homework now:
Mariam : Mum ... can I go to the cinema with Kerry later?
Mrs. Sony
: Sorry, you can't. You have to do your homework!
Mariam : But I haven't got much homework to do.
Mrs. Sony : First do the washing-up and your homework!
Mariam : Of course! But can I go out with her after that?
Mrs. Sony
: Mmm ... OK. Yes, you can.
mariam:thanks, mum

artinya apa ka?? tolong jawab yaa​

answers.answer:
Nyonya Sony

: Bisakah kamu mencucinya?

Mariam: Maaf, saya tidak bisa. Aku harus mengerjakan pekerjaaan rumahku.

Nyonya Sony

: Oh. Nah, pergi dan mulai pekerjaan rumah kamu sekarang:

Mariam : Bu... bolehkah aku pergi ke bioskop dengan Kerry nanti?

Nyonya Sony

: Maaf, kau tidak bisa. Kau harus melakukan pekerjaan rumah Kau!

Mariam: Tapi saya tidak punya banyak pekerjaan rumah yang harus dilakukan.

Mrs Sony : Pertama lakukan cucian dan pekerjaan rumahmu!

Mariam: Tentu saja! Tapi bisakah aku keluar setelah itu?

Nyonya Sony

: Mmm oke. Ya kamu bisa.

mariam: terima kasih, ibu

semoga bermanfaat.

Awalnya Mrs Sonny meminta Mariam mencuci, tapi Mariam menolak permintaan Mrs Sonny karena Mariam harus mengerjakan tugas (PR).

Mariam juga meminta ijin kepada Mrs Sony untuk pergi ke bioskop bersama Kerry, awalnya Mrs Sonny menolak, tetapi jika Mariam mencuci dan mengerjakan tugas Rumah, maka Mrs Sonny mengijinkan Mariam ke bioskop

2. Asti dan Nina di perpustakaan sekolah setiap hari.

4. Aku tidak selalu menyelesaikan semua tugasku setiap waktu.

9. Mirna biasanya menangis di kamarnya setiap malam.

10. Pak Hartono kadang-kadang membuat pakaiannya dengan sendirinya.

related_questions.question:
What kind of text is the text above?

help mee:v​

24. Della : "James, I need one hundred more bed    shield and pillow cases of any color. Can
you deliver them this week?”
James : "Sure but the price is increasing about
10%. Will you still make an order?”
Della : "If that's so, I have to tell this to my
boss. I'll give you a call after lunch."
What is the woman going to do?
A. Talk to her boss.
B. Cancel the order.
C. Buy the pillow.
D. Ask for a discount.
E. Look for another supplier.​

Peter is the youngest in our family. He is fourteen years old and four years younger than me. He has long, straight hair, bright eyes and a friendly smile. Sometimes he is rather naughty at home, but he usually does what he is asked to do.    Peter is interested in sports very much, and at school, he plays football and tennis. He is the best badminton player in our family.
3. Which of the following statement is not true about Peter​

27. Desi    "Do you mind if I use your pen to sign
this paper?"
"Just a moment. I haven't finished
writing my curriculum vitae."
Arif
What does the woman want?
A To borrow a pen.
B. To buy some paper,
C. To write an article.
D. To ask his paper,
E. To finish her writing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A

Penjelasan:

Artinya

Apakah kamu tidak keberatan kalau aku pinjam pulpen kamu buat tandatangani kertas ini?

Jawaban:

A.To borrow a pen

Penjelasan:

Desi ingin meminjam pena milik arif tapi,

Arif sedang menggunakan penanya untuk menyelesaikan tugasnya.

See you at the next answer

Pawuuu

related_questions.question:
What is the climax of the strory?    True Friends

 Once upon a time, there were two close friends who were walking through the forest together. They knew that anything dangerous can happen any time in the forest. So they promised each other that they would always be together in any case of danger.

 Suddenly, they saw a large bear getting closer toward them. One of them climbed a nearby tree at once. But unfortunately the other one did not know how to climb up the tree. So being led by his common sense, he lay down on the ground breathless and pretended to be a dead man.

 The bear came near the one who was lying on the ground. It smelt in his ears, and slowly left the place because the bears do not want to touch the dead creatures. After that, the friend on the tree came down and asked his friend that was on the ground, "Friend, what did the bear whisper into your ears?" The other friend replied, "Just now the bear advised me not to believe a false friend."

 Moral of the Story- A true friend in need is a friend indeed

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Apa klimaks dari cerita tersebut?

Teman sejati

Alkisah, ada dua orang sahabat yang sedang berjalan bersama di hutan. Mereka tahu bahwa segala sesuatu yang berbahaya dapat terjadi kapan saja di hutan. Jadi mereka berjanji satu sama lain bahwa mereka akan selalu bersama dalam keadaan bahaya apa pun.

Tiba-tiba, mereka melihat seekor beruang besar mendekat ke arah mereka. Salah satu dari mereka memanjat pohon terdekat sekaligus. Namun sayangnya yang satunya tidak tahu bagaimana cara memanjat pohon tersebut. Jadi dibimbing oleh akal sehatnya, dia berbaring di tanah dengan terengah-engah dan berpura-pura menjadi orang mati.

Beruang itu mendekati orang yang terbaring di tanah. Itu tercium di telinganya, dan perlahan meninggalkan tempat itu karena beruang tidak mau menyentuh makhluk mati. Setelah itu, teman di pohon itu turun dan bertanya kepada temannya yang ada di tanah, "Teman, apa yang dibisikkan beruang ke telingamu?" Teman yang lain menjawab, "Baru saja beruang itu menasihati saya untuk tidak mempercayai teman palsu."

Moral of the Story- Teman sejati yang membutuhkan adalah teman sejati.

Semoga membantu^^
